mapper.select: SELECT /* searchBoardContentDetail */ BOARD.BLBD_CD , BOARD.NOTI_NO , BOARD.TITLE , BOARD.CNTN , BOARD.INQ_CNT , BOARD.RCMD_CNT , BOARD.ANSW_YN , BOARD.HRANK_NOTI_NO , BOARD.ANSW_ORDER , BOARD.ANSW_LEVL , BOARD.FILE_ID , BOARD.DEL_YN , BOARD.INPT_ID , (SELECT CONCAT(KORN_NM , '(' , EMP_NO , ')') FROM T_SYTM_USER WHERE BOARD.INPT_ID = USER_ID) AS INPT_EMP_NO , DATE_FORMAT(BOARD.INPT_DTTM,'%Y%m%d') INPT_DTTM -- , BOARD.INPT_DTTM , BOARD.INPT_IP , '' AS STATUS , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS REPLY_CNT FROM T_COMM_BOARD_REPLY WHERE BLBD_CD = #{BOARD_CD} AND NOTI_NO = #{NOTI_NO} ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM T_COMM_BOARD BOARD WHERE BOARD.BLBD_CD = #{BOARD_CD} AND BOARD.NOTI_NO = #{NOTI_NO}

/* searchBoardContentDetailFile */ SELECT BB.FILE_ID , BF.FILE_SEQ , BF.SAVE_FILE_NM , BF.OTXT_FILE_NM , BF.FILE_SIZE , BF.FILE_TYPE , BF.FILE_PATH_NM , BF.INPT_ID , (SELECT EMP_NO FROM T_SYTM_USER WHERE BF.INPT_ID = USER_ID) AS INPT_EMP_NO , BF.INPT_DTTM , BF.INPT_IP FROM T_COMM_BOARD_FILE BF INNER JOIN T_COMM_BOARD BB ON BF.FILE_ID = BB.FILE_ID WHERE BB.BLBD_CD = #{BOARD_CD} AND BB.NOTI_NO = #{NOTI_NO}
/* searchBoardFileList */ SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_SEQ , SAVE_FILE_NM , OTXT_FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_TYPE , FILE_PATH_NM FROM T_COMM_BOARD_FILE WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_ID = #{FILE_ID}

SELECT /* searchBoardCardContentsCnt */ COUNT(*) AS TOTALCNT FROM T_COMM_BOARD B INNER JOIN T_SYTM_USER U ON B.INPT_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE B.BLBD_CD = #{BOARD_CD} AND DATE_FORMAT(B.INPT_DTTM, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{FROM_DATE} AND #{TO_DATE} AND DEL_YN = '0'
AND UPPER(B.TITLE) LIKE CONCAT('%' , UPPER(#{SEARCH_COND}) , '%')
AND CHARINDEX(UPPER(B.CNTN), UPPER(#{SEARCH_COND})) > 0

WITH RECURSIVE CTE_Dept AS ( SELECT AA.DEPT_CD, HIPO_DEPT_CD, (SELECT DEPT_KORN_NM FROM T_SYTM_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CD = AA.HIPO_DEPT_CD) AS HIPO_DEPT_NM, AA.DEPT_KORN_NM, AA.DEPT_ORDR, AA.DEPT_YN, AA.DEPT_FLAG_CD, AA.DEPT_LVL, AA.BEFO_DEPT_CD, CONVERT(AA.DEPT_ORDR, char(100)) as SortOrder FROM T_SYTM_DEPT AA WHERE DEPT_LVL = '0' UNION ALL SELECT BB.DEPT_CD, BB.HIPO_DEPT_CD, (SELECT DEPT_KORN_NM FROM T_SYTM_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CD = BB.HIPO_DEPT_CD) AS HIPO_DEPT_NM, BB.DEPT_KORN_NM, BB.DEPT_ORDR, BB.DEPT_YN, BB.DEPT_FLAG_CD, BB.DEPT_LVL, BB.BEFO_DEPT_CD, CONCAT(CTE_Dept.SortOrder, '|', BB.DEPT_ORDR) as DEPT_ORDER FROM T_SYTM_DEPT BB INNER JOIN CTE_Dept ON BB.HIPO_DEPT_CD = CTE_Dept.DEPT_CD )
SELECT DEPT_CD as CODE, DEPT_KORN_NM as NAME FROM CTE_Dept WHERE 1=1 AND CTE_Dept.DEPT_YN = '1' AND CTE_Dept.DEPT_FLAG_CD = '0040'
ORDER BY SortOrder
SELECT W.*, U.KORN_NM AS USER_NAME FROM T_WEEKREPORT W, T_SYTM_USER U WHERE W.RPT_NO = #{RPT_NO} AND W.INPT_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT BB.FILE_ID , BF.FILE_SEQ , BF.SAVE_FILE_NM , BF.OTXT_FILE_NM , BF.FILE_SIZE , BF.FILE_TYPE , BF.FILE_PATH_NM , BF.INPT_ID , BF.INPT_DTTM FROM T_WEEKREPORT_FILE BF INNER JOIN T_WEEKREPORT BB ON BF.FILE_ID = BB.FILE_ID WHERE BB.RPT_NO = #{RPT_NO}

SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_SEQ , SAVE_FILE_NM , OTXT_FILE_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_TYPE , FILE_PATH_NM FROM T_WEEKREPORT_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{FILE_ID}
AND FILE_SEQ = #{FILE_SEQ}
